fields.name: The Black Castle of NaGog
fields.description: The hero Gladmar has been possessed by a demon. The only hope to save him is to find the idol of Demogorgon in the evil ruins of the Black Castle of NaGog.
fields.intro_text:
A hero named Gladmar ventured to the gates of Hell itself in order to get the blessed ring of Eoervan for King Mithidas. Since his return, Gladmar has been haunted by increasingly more horrible dreams. Finally, a week ago, he went wild and had an insane fit. In the process of subduing him, ten of the palace guard were killed and many more were wounded.

The powerful wizard Dracnard has determined that Gladmar is possessed by the demon Demogorgon. The only way to cure him is to recover a magical golden statue of the demon which was last heard of in the possession of the evil Lord Rovnart of NaGog hundreds of years ago.

His stronghold, the Black Castle of NaGog, was conquered over two hundred years ago and all of its inhabitants were killed. The castle was then abandoned because of its evil reputation.

King Mithidas has called for adventurers to seek the idol of Demogorgon in the black castle to cure Gladmar. He offers a reward to the successful hero. However the deed must be done quickly, as Gladmar will soon be so completely under the demon's control that he can never be cured.

After riding for many days, you see a huge, sinister, black ruin standing stark on the horizon. As you get closer, the ruins seem to emanate an aura of ancient evil. The faint road you have been following leads to the smashed front gates.

fields.name: standing outside the castle
fields.description: You are standing outside the castle gates. To the north looms a huge, ruined castle made of a strange black stone. The gate is partially destroyed and you may enter the castle by moving north. To the south is the road back to town.

fields.name: under the gateway.
fields.description: You are standing beneath the gateway after squeezing past a smashed door. To the north is an open courtyard filled with sunlight. To the south is the exit from the castle.

fields.name: in an open courtyard.
fields.description: You are standing in a littered courtyard open to the sky. To the south is a half destroyed gate. East is a very wide door into a wooden structure. To the west are two man-sized doors. Looking north you see a tall set of double doors leading into the ruined castle.

fields.name: in a musty stable
fields.description: This is a damp, rundown stable with five wooden stalls. The floor is covered with musty straw and food scraps. You think some orcs might have been living in here. The only exit is through the door to the west.

fields.name: in the barracks.
fields.description: This large room obviously used to be a barracks. It has a number of cots and piles of rags that used to be clothes. To the south is a small, locked door and two doors in the east wall.

fields.name: in the southern part of the main hall
fields.description: You are standing in the southern half of a large hall. To the south is a pair of ornate double doors. To the east and west are small doors. There is a wooden trestle in the middle of the floor.

fields.name: in the north main hall.
fields.description: You are at the north end of the castle's main hall. To the north you see a large, ornately carved throne and a door in the wall. To the west is another door. To the south is the rest of the main audience hall.

fields.name: in the lord's bedroom.
fields.description: This is a large, ornately decorated room. The tapestries, rich rugs, and canopy bed have all been badly damaged by age and by the monsters living here. There are doors in the west and south walls.

fields.name: at the north end of a hallway.
fields.description: You are at the north end of a bare hallway, which runs south from here. There are doors in the north and east walls.

fields.name: in a n/s hallway with doors east and west.
fields.description: You are standing in a north/south hallway with doors in the east and west walls. To the north, the hallway leads toward some bedrooms. To the south, it leads toward the castle entrance.

fields.name: in a n/s hallway with a door west.
fields.description: This is a long north/south hallway with a door in the west wall.

fields.name: at the south end of a hallway.
fields.description: The hallway ends to the south, but continues to the north. There are doors in the east and west walls.

fields.name: in an east/west hallway near the kitchen.
fields.description: You are at the east end of an east-west hallway near the castle entrance. To the west, the hall ends in a doorway. To the north is another door which appears to lead into the castle's kitchen.

fields.name: at the south end of a hallway.
fields.description: You are at the south end of a long hallway. The floor is covered with a worn red carpet. To the north the hallway continues into the darkness. There is a door in the west wall.

fields.name: in a n/s hallway near the kitchen.
fields.description: The hallway continues north and south. To the west is a door that appears to lead to the kitchens. On the floor is a worn red carpet covered with greasy stains.

fields.name: in a n/s hallway.
fields.description: The hallway continues north and south, with a wooden door in the west wall. On the floor is a dirty and badly stained red carpet.

fields.name: at the north end of a carpeted hallway.
fields.description: You are at the north end of a north-south hallway. There is a door in the west wall. The floor is covered with a dirty and moldly red carpet.

fields.name: in the servant's quarters.
fields.description: This is a fair sized room filled with the broken remains of cots and foot lockers. The only exit is the door in the east wall. There is a thick layer of dust covering everything, although it looks disturbed in a few places.

fields.name: in the storage room.
fields.description: This room is filled with looted boxes and kegs. In the middle of the floor is the shriveled husk of some poor adventurer. In the northwest corner, a stairway descends into the inky depths. A door leads east.

fields.name: in the kitchen.
fields.description: You are in the castle's kitchen. There are doors in the south and east walls. There is a huge, grimy stove and a badly chipped sink against the west wall. A long table dominates the middle of the room. Sitting on the stove is a large kettle that seems to bubble curiously.

fields.name: in the guard room.
fields.description: You are in a bare room with moldly straw covering the floor. There is only one exit, a door in the east wall. On the west wall are rotten wooden sword racks.

fields.name: in the guest room.
fields.description: Once this was a fashionable bedroom; however, over the years, the furniture has fallen to pieces. The only exit is a door in the east wall.

fields.name: in the library.
fields.description: The north, south and west walls of this room are covered with dilapidated shelves. The only exit is a wooden door in the east wall. Most of the books turn to dust when you touch them.

fields.name: in milady's bedroom.
fields.description: You see a very femininely decorated bedroom with a canopied bed and an oak dresser. However, the canopy has been torn to shreds and the ruined bed is badly soiled by some creature that has been sleeping here. There is an ornate vanity against the west wall. A door leads south.

fields.name: at the top of a secret stairway.
fields.description: To your south you see a small peep hole looking into the library and a lever which opens the secret door. To the north a stairway descends into an unlit chamber of dank stone.

fields.name: in the armory.
fields.description: At one time this room was an armory for the castle. You see rusty swords, pikes, spears and broken bows. In one cornor there appears to be the remains of rotten leather armor. The only exit is in the north.

fields.name: in a damp basement chamber.
fields.description: You are in a bare stone room beneath the castle. Dark tunnels lead north, south, east, and west. A stairway leads up, but it doesn't look much brighter up there.

fields.name: in the root cellar.
fields.description: This cellar has north, south and west walls of dirt, as is the floor. However, the east wall is made of red brick. There are piles of rotting and dessicated roots lying everywhere. A worn stone staircase leads up.

fields.name: in a n/s tunnel with door west.
fields.description: This natural tunnel runs north and south with a barred iron door in the west wall there are many stalactite hanging from the ceiling and stalagmites growing up from the floor.

fields.name: in a stark prison cell.
fields.description: You see an empty room with bare walls and floor. This was obviously a dungeon cell.

fields.name: in a huge cave.
fields.description: You enter a huge cavern with a strange musky odor. To the north is a tunnel mouth. The south end of the cave is a large pile of boulders. The floor is littered with stony rubble.

fields.name: in the hidden cave.
fields.description: You see a high ceilinged cavern with several limestone columns streching from ceiling to floor. To the north is a narrow opening. In the center of the cave sits a dull black cube some 5' on a side.

fields.name: in a torture chamber.
fields.description: This room is filled with various torture equipment in very poor condition. There are an iron maiden and a rack. There is an archway in the east wall. Several skeletons are chained to the west wall.

fields.name: in an alchemical laboratory.
fields.description: The only exit is an opening in the south wall. The north, west and east walls of this room are lined with shelves filled with a variety of bottles and vials. A large wooden table is covered with strange alchemical equipment.

fields.name: in a storage room.
fields.description: Here is a storage room with many boxes strewn about. Several have been broken open revealing moldy furniture. The east end of the room is dark and you can't see the east wall clearly.

fields.name: in a northern room.
fields.description: This is a barren, square room with an opening in the south wall.

fields.name: in a western room.
fields.description: This is an empty room with an opening in the east wall. The floor appears discolored with reddish stains.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You have come to a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in a northern room.
fields.description: You are in a barren, square room with an opening in the south wall.

fields.name: in a northern room.
fields.description: You are in a barren, square room with an opening in the south wall.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels. To the north and east are small rooms. To the south and west, the tunnels extend out of sight.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in the tomb of Lady Direxi.
fields.description: You are in a small room graced with colorful frescoes of a beautiful woman on the north and south walls. The only exit is an opening in the west wall.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in a square room.
fields.description: This room has walls of bare rock except for the west wall which is made of brick . The only exit is an opening in the east wall.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in the tomb of Gaspard.
fields.description: You see a room cluttered with decaying furnishings and strung with cobwebs.

fields.name: in a westside room
fields.description: This is a bare rock room with only one exit, an opening in the east wall. The room looks like it was carved out of bedrock.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection near the temple.
fields.description: You are in a 4-way intersection of tunnels. A large room to the south appears to be a temple. To the north, east, and west, the tunnels disappear into the darkness.

fields.name: in a 4-way intersection.
fields.description: You see a 4-way intersection of tunnels.

fields.name: in a southside room.
fields.description: This room has only one exit, an opening in the north wall. On the south wall is a colorful mosaic depicting a battle between hordes of undead and a few harassed elves, one of whom is being torn to pieces.

fields.name: in the north half of the temple.
fields.description: This enormous chamber appears to be part of a temple. To the south is a huge chasm which separates you from the other half of the temple. To the north is a passageway. The bottom of the chasm is not visible in the darkness.

fields.name: in the south part of the temple.
fields.description: To the north is a bottomless chasm. In the middle of this room is a bloodstained altar of ironwood in front of a stone statue. Against the south wall stands a bas-relief of a priest.

fields.name: in the burial chamber.
fields.description: This chamber has one exit, an opening in the north wall.

fields.name: in the inner sanctuary.
fields.description: There is a door in the north wall. Against the south wall is a dead black stone altar crusted with old bloodstains in front of the altar is a withered corpse inside of a pentagram.

fields.name: in the crypt of King Imhotep
fields.description: You are in a dark, dusty crypt with a door in the west wall.

fields.name: in the tomb of Montrose
fields.description: You are in a dark, dusty tomb with an opening in the east wall.

fields.name: in the tomb of Guillaume
fields.description: You are in an elegant crypt with elaborate stonework on the walls. An opening in the west wall is the only exit.

fields.name: in the crypt of Rovnart
fields.description: You are standing in an ornately decorated room with a brass plate in the east wall. The only exit is an opening in the west wall.

fields.name: jeweled key
fields.description: A ruby and emerald encrusted key sits on a black stone block. It shimmers with a strange golden light. Inscribed on it is "FOR BRIDGE SAY 'MORGAR'".

fields.name: gold idol of Demogorgon
fields.description: A 12-inch-tall gold statue of a strange, two-headed creature rests on the altar at the south end of the room. It seems to emit a strong feeling of evil.

fields.name: wand of magic missiles
fields.description: A slim wand covered with arcane symbols lies forgotten in the corner.

fields.name: ring of fire
fields.description: You see a small, golden ring. The ring seems to burn with a bright red and orange flame.

fields.name: silver coins
fields.description: There is a small pile of silver coins on the floor.

fields.name: electrum coins
fields.description: There is a bag of electrum coins lying on the floor.

fields.name: gold coins
fields.description: You see a pile of loose gold coins.

fields.name: platinum coins
fields.description: There is a neat stack of platinum coins sitting on a chair.

fields.name: magic spear
fields.description: On the floor is a very shiny spear. It looks extremely sharp.

fields.name: spellbook
fields.description: On one shelf is an ornate book titled 'On Magickal Symbols'.

fields.name: healing potion
fields.description: A small ceramic vial with a dusty label sits on a high shelf.

fields.name: diamonds
fields.description: In the bottom of the tomb you see some glittering. Upon closer examination you find a small pile of diamonds.

fields.name: emeralds
fields.description: In a pouch inside the sarchophagus are several shining emeralds.

fields.name: rubies
fields.description: Five large, pigeon blood rubies are inset in the face of the crypt.

fields.name: jewels
fields.description: On the body in the crypt you see several rings and a diamond and emerald necklace.

fields.name: club
fields.description: On the ground is an ornate club of fine construction.

fields.name: sword
fields.description: On the ground is a sword.

fields.name: sword
fields.description: There is a sword on the ground.

fields.name: huge club
fields.description: On the ground is a huge but poorly made club.

fields.name: axe
fields.description: Here lies an axe.

fields.name: short sword
fields.description: There is a short sword on the ground.

fields.name: short sword
fields.description: On the ground is a short sword.

fields.name: long bow
fields.description: On the ground is a long bow.

fields.name: spear
fields.description: On the ground is a spear.

fields.name: sword
fields.description: On the ground is a sword.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: On the ground is a mace.

fields.name: dead troll
fields.description: On the ground is the body of the troll.

fields.name: dead bugbear
fields.description: On the ground is a dead bugbear.

fields.name: stinking cloud of vapor
fields.description: The demon evaporates into a sickly green cloud of stinking vapor.

fields.name: dead black pudding
fields.description: On the ground is a slimy pool of dead black pudding.

fields.name: dead gargoyle
fields.description: The smashed stone remains of the gargoyle lie on the ground.

fields.name: dead ghoul
fields.description: On the ground is a dead ghoul.

fields.name: dead elf
fields.description: On the ground is a dead elf.

fields.name: dead gnoll
fields.description: There is a dead gnoll here.

fields.name: dead orc
fields.description: You see the bloody body of a dead orc.

fields.name: dead harpy
fields.description: Here is a filthy dead harpy.

fields.name: dead hell hound
fields.description: Here is the dead body of a hell hound.

fields.name: dead fighter
fields.description: The hacked remains of a human fighter lie on the floor.

fields.name: dead wizard
fields.description: The wizard lies stiffened in death.

fields.name: dead hobgoblin
fields.description: Here is a dead hobgoblin.

fields.name: dead lammasu
fields.description: Here is a dead lammasu

fields.name: dead hill giant
fields.description: Spralwed on the floor is the huge body of a dead giant.

fields.name: pile of rags and dust
fields.description: The mummy collasped into a pile of dusty old rags.

fields.name: pool of goo
fields.description: The jelly dissolves into a pool of yellow goo.

fields.name: dead piercer
fields.description: Here is a broken stalactite on the floor

fields.name: dead stirge
fields.description: Here is a dead stirge.

fields.name: dead umber hulk
fields.description: The large body of an umber hulk lies on the floor.

fields.name: dead giant tick
fields.description: Here is a dead giant tick.

fields.name: pile of bones
fields.description: The skeleton falls apart into a jumbled mass of broken bones.

fields.name: dead body
fields.description: Here is a very decayed human body.

fields.name: dead hydra
fields.description: The heads of a large hydra lie still in the throes of death.

fields.name: dead ogre
fields.description: Here is a dead ogre.

fields.name: dead owlbear
fields.description: Here is a dead owlbear.

fields.name: dead rat
fields.description: Here is a dead rat.

fields.name: stinking cloud of demon essence
fields.description: The dead demon evaporates into a putrid vapor. The cloud has a horrible odor of burning sulfur and rotting flesh.

fields.name: stinking cloud of demon essence
fields.description: The demon falls and boils away leaving a roiling cloud of oily black smoke. Its odor makes you gag and retch.

fields.name: tomb of King Imhotep
fields.description: In the east wall is a tomb with a corroded copper plate inscribed, 'HERE LIES KING IMHOTEP. MAY THE CURSE OF FEAR FOLLOW THE THIEF WHO DESECRATES HIS TOMB.'

fields.name: tomb of Montrose
fields.description: Set in the west wall is a tomb with an iron plate inscribed thus: 'HERE LIES MONTROSE, FIRST COUNT OF NAGOG.'

fields.name: coffin
fields.description: Against the east wall is a heavy iron coffin inscribed with the name of Lady Direxi.

fields.name: sarcophagus
fields.description: There is a beautifully sculpted sarcophagus against the east wall. The name plate reads: 'GUILLAUME, SECOND COUNT OF NAGOG. REST IN PEACE'

fields.name: Gaspard's tomb
fields.description: Set in the east wall is a metal plate bearing the name 'GASPARD, THIRD COUNT OF NAGOG'.

fields.name: Rovnart's tomb
fields.description: You see the tomb of Rovnart. On the name plate is written: 'HERE RESTS COUNT ROVNART OF NAGOG. DO NOT OPEN CRYPT ON PERIL OF SOUL'

fields.name: sarcophagus
fields.description: In the middle of the room is a huge stone sarcophagus. Runes carved on it say, 'HERE LIES BRAK HAMMERHAND, LAST GOODY-GOODY OF NAGOG.'

fields.name: shelves (secret door north)
fields.description: A section of shelves in the north wall swing open, revealing a secret passage!

fields.name: secret door
fields.description: In the south wall is a secret door, made up of the back of a bookshelf.

fields.name: secret passage south
fields.description: Searching the south wall uncovers a large, loose boulder. Rolling the rock aside reveals a dark tunnel leading south.

fields.name: secret door in the east wall
fields.description: Searching the shadows, you find a secret door in the east wall! Beyond it is a dark tunnel.

fields.name: hole in the brick wall to the east
fields.description: A number of loose bricks in the east wall are easily removed, making a small opening into an adjacent room.

fields.name: hole in the brick wall to the west
fields.description: A number of loose bricks in the west wall are easily removed, making a small opening into an adjacent room.

fields.name: priest sculpture
fields.description: The south wall is a sculpture of a priest in long, flowing robes, carrying a scepter. In the head of the scepter are five small, empty sockets. On closer inspection, you realize the carving conceals a secret door in the south wall!

fields.name: kettle
fields.description: You see a large, black kettle sitting on the stove.

fields.name: throne
fields.description: You see a large, ornately carved throne. The stonework and gilding were once impressive, but are tarnished and stained by years of neglect. There is some writing on the side which you could read.

fields.name: dresser
fields.description: You see an ornate wooden dresser that is now splintered and covered in years of dust and grime. The top drawer seems like it would still open.

fields.name: dead adventurer
fields.description: You see the long-dead, dessicated body. All of its weapons and armor have been removed. From the little of its clothing that remains, it appears that the poor soul was wearing the colors of a Free Adventurer. You see nothing of value.

fields.name: broken boxes
fields.description: You see a pile of broken boxes and smashed wine kegs. Nothing of value remains.

fields.name: oak dresser
fields.description: Along the north wall is a carved oak dresser.

fields.name: note
fields.description: You see a note written on faded old parchment.

fields.text:
As the plate opens, a strangely moving cloud of gas pours out. You are immersed by the odor of an unopened grave.

You have a strange feeling that some evil creature is right behind you. From your constant paranoia, your charisma drops.

Carved on the throne it says:

TAKE THE GEMS OF RED
TO FIND THE IDOL OF DREAD
It says, 'Below and across the crystal is the shrine of D.’
A mist appears over the chasm and then parts to reveal a crystal bridge spanning the gorge.
After reading the book you understand your magic spells better, thus making it easier to cast them. When you finish reading, the book evaporates into smoke.

fields.name: Troll
fields.description: A large, rubbery looking humanoid sits on the throne. It is a sickly green color with large claws and big teeth. As you enter, it stands and lunges at you.

fields.name: Bugbear
fields.description: You see a 7-foot-tall bugbear dressed in odds and ends of ragged armor. He is wielding a sword and looks very unfriendly.

fields.name: Demon
fields.description: As you enter the inner sanctum, a dark cloud forms in the middle of the room. Gradually it solidifies into a huge creature with horns, bat wings and long claws. Demonic laughter pours from its mouth as it flies at you.

fields.name: Black pudding
fields.description: As you examine the kettle on the stove, a black pudding slithers out and attacks you.

fields.name: Gargoyle
fields.description: When you approach the statue, it changes form into a horned and winged gargoyle. The gargoyle launches itself at you.

fields.name: Ghoul
fields.description: The tomb opens and out climbs a ghastly creature with long grimy claws and a nauseating, carrion smell. The ghoul starts gibbering as it comes at you.

fields.name: Elf
fields.description: A tall elf in chain armor carrying a long bow looks up as you enter the room.

fields.name: Gnoll
fields.description: You see a tall humaniod creature with the head of a dog holding a spear. When the gnoll sees you, he readies his spear.

fields.name: Orc
fields.description: Two orcs armed with a short swords stand blocking your way.

fields.name: Harpy
fields.description: Around your head flies a foul smelling bird with the upper body of a woman. She screams imprecations at you and dives to attack.

fields.name: Hell hound
fields.description: A loud baying noise comes from the jaws of a huge, jet black hound. As it charges, you can see flames pour from its mouth.

fields.name: Fighter
fields.description: A human fighter dressed in plate armor is examining one of the torture devices. He turns slowly as you come into the room.

fields.name: Wizard
fields.description: You see a human dressed in mystical robes calmly reading an old book. As you enter, he looks up and sighes.

fields.name: Hobgoblin
fields.description: A hobgoblin was practicing swinging an axe as you walked through the door. He smiles and readies himself for combat.

fields.name: Lammasu
fields.description: A lion with the face of a man and wings is pacing back and forth in the cell.

fields.name: Hill giant
fields.description: A 10-foot-tall humanoid wearing badly cured skins and carrying a huge club charges you as you enter the hidden cave.

fields.name: Mummy
fields.description: The crypt opens revealing a body wrapped in linen strips. Suddenly one of the arms lifts and the mummy starts limping towards you.

fields.name: Ochre jelly
fields.description: On one of the benches rests a large flask of a viscous yellow liquid. As you investigate, the gelatinous substance flows out of the flask and advances towards you.

fields.name: Piercer
fields.description: As you are walking along the tunnel, a large stalactite falls from the ceiling directly above your head. As it descends, you notice it has small eyes and a mouth.

fields.name: Stirge
fields.description: A small flying creature with a long, sharp beak comes buzzing towards you. It dives at your exposed neck. You recognize the stirge as a blood sucking menace.

fields.name: Umber hulk
fields.description: A massive dark brown creature stands in the southeast corner of the room. It has huge tusks and large claws. Its four eyes seem to make your senses whirl as it comes towards you.

fields.name: Giant tick
fields.description: Suddenly something drops from the ceiling onto your shoulders. It's a huge tick which is trying to attach itself to your skin.

fields.name: Skeleton
fields.description: Several animated skeletons stand here. When they see you, they hurry toward you.

fields.name: Zombie
fields.description: The rotten corpses of two former humans stagger towards you.

fields.name: Hydra
fields.description: The seven serpentine heads of an enormous hydra rise hissing when they sight you. It snaps hungrily at you as it approaches.

fields.name: Ogre
fields.description: In a southern corner of the chamber sits a large, ugly ogre with a large, spiked club.

fields.name: Owlbear
fields.description: A monster rushes you from the south wall. It looks like a disgusting cross between an owl and a giant bear.

fields.name: Giant rat
fields.description: You see two gigantic, sumatran rats with very sharp teeth.

fields.name: Vrock demon
fields.description: An 8-foot-tall, vulture-headed creature swoops down at you, gliding on huge, black wings. It emits a terrifying screech and attacks you with long, sharp claws. With a sinking feeling, you recognize it as a Vrock Demon.

fields.name: Balor demon
fields.description: The air near you parts, revealing a 10-foot-tall winged demon! It has leathery bat wings and its skin seems to shimmer with heat. In one hand it wields a glowing sword of pure lightning, and in the other is a fiery whip.

fields.question: I can't seem to get into the basement!
How do I get across the chasm?
How do I open the sculpture wall?
Help! I found the idol and got hit by lightning!

fields.answer: Try looking for secret doors. You can find clues in the room descriptions.
Look at the bookshelf in the library, or the brick wall in the root cellar.
Find the Jeweled Key and it will give you a hint.
There is a secret door near the hydra.
LOOK BOULDER after defeating the hydra. Go south and get the jeweled key. Then go to the chasm and say the magic word.
Notice the empty sockets in the scepter. There are five of them. What other item did you find five of? Try putting them into the sculpture.
Find the rubies. Then PUT RUBIES INTO SCULPTURE.
Evil forces are at work in the Black Castle, and they try to protect what is theirs. But you can sometimes dodge it. A high agility helps.
